languages.text: "Назракею не нужно было высовываться из Паутины. Впрочем, у него явно не было выбора, если за спиной его действительно пылал гнев Векта".
"Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."
languages.original_text: "Назракею не нужно было высовываться из Паутины. Впрочем, у него явно не было выбора, если за спиной его действительно пылал гнев Векта".

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

languages.text: “纳札骸没有理由离开网道，但如果他惹恼了维克特，那他确实别无选择。”
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

traits.locale_text: “纳札骸没有理由离开网道，但如果他惹恼了维克特，那他确实别无选择。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Nazrakhei n'avait aucune raison de quitter la Toile, mais j'imagine que si Vect était à ses trousses, il n'avait pas le choix. »
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

traits.locale_text: « Nazrakhei n'avait aucune raison de quitter la Toile, mais j'imagine que si Vect était à ses trousses, il n'avait pas le choix. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Nazrakhei no tenía motivos para salir de la Telaraña, pero si la ira de Vect lo perseguía no tendría otra elección que hacer precisamente eso».
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

traits.locale_text: «Nazrakhei no tenía motivos para salir de la Telaraña, pero si la ira de Vect lo perseguía no tendría otra elección que hacer precisamente eso».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ナズラクヘイには網辻を離れる理由がなかった。だが、ヴェクトの怒りが本当に彼の背中に燃え盛っていたのなら、選択の余地はなかったに違いない」
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

traits.locale_text: 「ナズラクヘイには網辻を離れる理由がなかった。だが、ヴェクトの怒りが本当に彼の背中に燃え盛っていたのなら、選択の余地はなかったに違いない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nazrakhei hatte keinen Grund, das Netz der Tausend Tore zu verlassen. Doch er hatte wohl keine Wahl, wenn Vects flammender Zorn wirklich an seinem Rücken züngelte."
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei hatte keinen Grund, das Netz der Tausend Tore zu verlassen. Doch er hatte wohl keine Wahl, wenn Vects flammender Zorn wirklich an seinem Rücken züngelte."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

languages.text: "Nazrakhei'in Ağyol'dan ayrılmak için sebebi yoktu. Gerçi Vect'in öfkesi boğazına yapıştıysa elinden bir şey gelmemiştir."
languages.original_text: "Nazrakhei had no reason to leave the Webway. But he must not have had a choice if Vect's wrath was truly blazing at his back."

traits.locale_text: "Nazrakhei'in Ağyol'dan ayrılmak için bir sebebi yoktu. Gerçi Vect'in öfkesi boğazına yapıştıysa elinden bir şey gelmemiştir."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
